metadata.title: CVE-2018-10198 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OTRS 6.0.x before 6.0.7. An attacker who is logged into OTRS as a customer can use the ticket overview screen to disclose internal article information of their customer tickets.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.7-1').
